name: SQL Server
description: Main non volatile data store for all services.

name: Docker
description: Used for containerization of all services.

description: Used in development environment for management of Kubernetes clusters.

description: Technique mainly used to synchronize data from frontend to backend and vice versa.

description: Future management platform of Kubernetes clusters for production environment .

name: Hazelcast
